message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you 20% of the total. Accept and we can seal the deal!
I'll give you 60% and keep 40% for myself. It's a reasonable compromise!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. 70% is a fair share, don't you think, Bob?
I'll meet you halfway, Alice. 50/50 split, no more negotiations!
